00020 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00021 // Routines to access PARTICLE data
00022 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00023 void SGP_Particle_Properties(   long*   particle_no,
00024                                                                 /* return values*/
00025                                                                 char**  particle_name,
00026                                                                 char**  USRTRACK_name,
00027                                                                 char**  element_name,
00028                                                                 long*   Z,
00029                                                                 long*   A,
00030                                                                 float*  mass)
00031 {
00032         long i = (*particle_no) - 1;
00033 
00034         strcpy(*particle_name,          SGP_Particle_Data.particle_name[i]);
00035         strcpy(*USRTRACK_name,          SGP_Particle_Data.USRTRACK_name[i]);
00036         strcpy(*element_name,           SGP_Particle_Data.element_name[i]);
00037         *Z                                                      = SGP_Particle_Data.Z[i];
00038         *A                                                      = SGP_Particle_Data.A[i];
00039         *mass                                           = SGP_Particle_Data.mass[i];
00040 }

00042 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00043 // Routines to access MATERIAL data
00044 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00045 void SGP_getMaterialData(               long*   n,
00046                                                                 long*   material_no,
00047                                                                 float*  density_g_cm3,
00048                                                                 float*  electron_density_m3,
00049                                                                 float*  I_eV,
00050                                                                 float*  alpha_g_cm2_MeV,
00051                                                                 float*  p_MeV,
00052                                                                 float*  m_g_cm2)
00053 {
00054         long*   match   =       (long*)calloc(*n, sizeof(long));
00055         pmatchi(        material_no,
00056                                 n,
00057                                 SGP_Material_Data.material_no,
00058                                 &SGP_Material_Data.n,
00059                                 match);
00060 
00061         long i;
00062         for(i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00063                 density_g_cm3[i]                = SGP_Material_Data.density_g_cm3[match[i]];
00064                 electron_density_m3[i]  = SGP_Material_Data.electron_density_m3[match[i]];
00065                 I_eV[i]                                 = SGP_Material_Data.I_eV[match[i]];
00066                 alpha_g_cm2_MeV[i]              = SGP_Material_Data.alpha_g_cm2_MeV[match[i]];
00067                 p_MeV[i]                                = SGP_Material_Data.p_MeV[match[i]];
00068                 m_g_cm2[i]                              = SGP_Material_Data.m_g_cm2[match[i]];
00069         }
00070 
00071         free(match);
00072 }
00073 
00074 
00075 #define matchIt                 long    n_mat   = 1;                                                                    \
00076                                                 pmatchc(        &material_name,                                                         \
00077                                                                         &n_mat,                                                                         \
00078                                                                         SGP_Material_Data.material_name,                        \
00079                                                                         &SGP_Material_Data.n,                                           \
00080                                                                         &match);

00086         long    i;
00087         for(i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00088                 density_g_cm3[i]                = SGP_Material_Data.density_g_cm3[match];}}

00141 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00142 // Routines to access PSTAR data

00144 
00145 void SGP_LET_MeV_cm2_g( long*   n,
00146                                                 float*  E_MeV_u,
00147                                                 long*   particle_no,
00148                                                 long*   material_no,
00149                                                 float*  LET_MeV_cm2_g)
00150 {
00151 
00152 #ifdef _DEBUG
00153         indnt_init();
00154         indnt_inc();
00155         fprintf(debf,"%sbegin SGP_LET_MeV_cm2_g\n",isp);
00156 
00157         fprintf(debf,"%sn = %ld, material_no = %ld\n", isp, *n, *material_no);
00158         long ii;
00159         for( ii = 0 ; ii < *n ; ii++){
00160                 fprintf(debf,"%sE_MeV_u[%ld]=%e\n", isp, ii , E_MeV_u[ii]);
00161                 fprintf(debf,"%sparticle_no[%ld]=%ld\n", isp, ii , particle_no[ii]);
00162         }
00163 #endif
00164 
00165         // get scaled energies for all given particles and energies
00166         float*  sE      =       (float*)calloc(*n, sizeof(float));
00167         SGP_scaled_energy(      n,
00168                                                 E_MeV_u,
00169                                                 particle_no,
00170                                                 sE);
00171 
00172 #ifdef _DEBUG
00173         fprintf(debf,"%sE[0]=%e\n", isp, sE[0]);
00174 #endif
00175 
00176         // get effective charge for all given particles and energies
00177         float*  eC      =       (float*)calloc(*n, sizeof(float));
00178         SGP_effective_charge_from_particle_no(  n,
00179                                                                                         E_MeV_u,
00180                                                                                         particle_no,
00181                                                                                         eC);
00182 
00183         getPSTARvalue(n, sE, material_no, SGP_PSTAR_Data.kin_E_MeV, SGP_PSTAR_Data.stp_pow_el_MeV_cm2_g, LET_MeV_cm2_g);
00184         long    i;
00185         for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00186                 LET_MeV_cm2_g[i] *=     eC[i] * eC[i];
00187         }
00188 
00189         free(eC);
00190         free(sE);
00191 
00192 #ifdef _DEBUG
00193         fprintf(debf,"%send SGP_LET_MeV_cm2_g\n", isp);
00194         indnt_dec();
00195 #endif
00196 
00197 }

00200 void SGP_LET_keV_um(    long*   n,
00201                                                 float*  E_MeV_u,
00202                                                 long*   particle_no,
00203                                                 long*   material_no,
00204                                                 float*  LET_keV_um)
00205 {
00206         long    match, n_tmp = 1;
00207         pmatchi(        material_no,
00208                                 &n_tmp,
00209                                 SGP_Material_Data.material_no,
00210                                 &SGP_Material_Data.n,
00211                                 &match);
00212 
00213         // Get mass-norm. LET
00214         SGP_LET_MeV_cm2_g(      n,
00215                                                 E_MeV_u,
00216                                                 particle_no,
00217                                                 material_no,
00218                                                 LET_keV_um);
00219 
00220         long    i;
00221         for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00222                 LET_keV_um[i]   *=      SGP_Material_Data.density_g_cm3[match] * 0.1f;
00223         }
00224 
00225 }

00260 
00261 void SGP_beta_from_particle_no( long*   n,
00262                                                                         float*  E_MeV_u,
00263                                                                         long*   particle_no,
00264                                                                         float*  beta)
00265 {
00266         // find look-up indices for A's for particle numbers in particle data
00267         long*   matches =       (long*)calloc(*n, sizeof(long));
00268         float*  mass    =       (float*)calloc(*n, sizeof(float));
00269 
00270         pmatchi(        particle_no,
00271                                 n,
00272                                 SGP_Particle_Data.particle_no,
00273                                 &SGP_Particle_Data.n,
00274                                 matches);
00275 
00276         // loop over n to find beta for all given particles and energies
00277         long    i;
00278         for(i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00279                 mass[i] = SGP_Particle_Data.mass[matches[i]];}
00280 
00281         SGP_beta_from_mass(     n,
00282                                                 E_MeV_u,
00283                                                 mass,
00284                                                 beta);
00285         free(mass);
00286         free(matches);
00287 }
00288 
00289 void SGP_beta_from_mass(        long*   n,
00290                                                         float*  E_MeV_u,
00291                                                         float*  mass,
00292                                                         float*  beta)
00293 {
00294         // loop over n to find beta for all given particles and energies
00295         long    i;
00296         for(i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00297 
00298                 float   E_MeV           =       E_MeV_u[i] * mass[i];
00299 
00300                 // Get rest energy
00301                 float   E0_MeV          =       (float)proton_mass_MeV_c2 * mass[i];
00302 
00303                 // Return relativistic speed
00304                 beta[i]                         =       (float)sqrt(1 - 1/((1 + E_MeV/E0_MeV)*(1 + E_MeV/E0_MeV)));
00305         }
00306 }
00307 
00308 void SGP_E_from_beta_and_mass(  long*   n,
00309                                                                 float*  beta,
00310                                                                 float*  mass,
00311                                                                 float*  E_MeV_u)
00312 {
00313         // loop over n to find beta for all given particles and energies
00314         long    i;
00315         for(i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00316 
00317 
00318                 // Get rest energy
00319                 float   E0_MeV          =       (float)proton_mass_MeV_c2 * mass[i];
00320 
00321                 E_MeV_u[i]                      =       E0_MeV * (1.0f / (1 - beta[i]*beta[i]) - 1);
00322 
00323                 E_MeV_u[i]                      /=      mass[i];
00324         }
00325 }
00326 
00327 void SGP_E_from_beta_and_particle_no(   long*   n,
00328                                                                                         float*  beta,
00329                                                                                         long*   particle_no,
00330                                                                                         float*  E_MeV_u)
00331 {
00332         // find look-up indices for A's for particle numbers in particle data
00333         long*   matches =       (long*)calloc(*n, sizeof(long));
00334         float*  mass    =       (float*)calloc(*n, sizeof(float));
00335 
00336         pmatchi(        particle_no,
00337                                 n,
00338                                 SGP_Particle_Data.particle_no,
00339                                 &SGP_Particle_Data.n,
00340                                 matches);
00341 
00342         // loop over n to find beta for all given particles and energies
00343         long    i;
00344         for(i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00345                 mass[i] = SGP_Particle_Data.mass[matches[i]];}
00346 
00347         SGP_E_from_beta_and_mass(       n,
00348                                                                 beta,
00349                                                                 mass,
00350                                                                 E_MeV_u);
00351         free(mass);
00352         free(matches);
00353 }

00356 void SGP_effective_charge_from_particle_no(     long*   n,
00357                                                                                                 float*  E_MeV_u,
00358                                                                                                 long*   particle_no,
00359                                                                                                 float*  effective_charge)
00360 {
00361         // get relativistic speeds for all given particles and energies
00362         float*  beta    =       (float*)calloc(*n, sizeof(float));
00363         long*   Z               =       (long*)calloc(*n, sizeof(long));
00364 
00365         SGP_beta_from_particle_no(      n,
00366                                                                         E_MeV_u,
00367                                                                         particle_no,
00368                                                                         beta);
00369 
00370         // find look-up indices for Z's for particle numbers in particle data
00371         long*   matches =       (long*)calloc(*n, sizeof(long));
00372         pmatchi(        particle_no,
00373                                 n,
00374                                 SGP_Particle_Data.particle_no,
00375                                 &SGP_Particle_Data.n,
00376                                 matches);
00377 
00378         long i;
00379         for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00380                 Z[i]    =       SGP_Particle_Data.Z[matches[i]];
00381         }
00382 
00383         SGP_effective_charge_from_beta( n,
00384                                                                         beta,
00385                                                                         Z,
00386                                                                         effective_charge);
00387 
00388         free(beta);
00389         free(Z);
00390         free(matches);
00391 }
00392 
00393 void SGP_effective_charge_from_beta(    long*   n,
00394                                                                                 float*  beta,
00395                                                                                 long*   Z,
00396                                                                                 float*  effective_charge)
00397 {
00398         // loop over n
00399         long    i;
00400         for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00401                 // Return effective charge according to Barkas-Bethe-approximation (but not for protons!)
00402 //              if (Z[i]!=1){
00403                         effective_charge[i]     = (float)(Z[i]) * (1 - (float)exp(-125.0f * beta[i] / (pow(Z[i], 2.0f/3.0f))));//}
00404 //              else{
00405 //                      effective_charge[i]     = (float)(Z[i]);}
00406         }
00407 }

00411 void SGP_scaled_energy( long*   n,
00412                                                 float*  E_MeV_u,
00413                                                 long*   particle_no,
00414                                                 float*  scaled_energy)
00415 {
00416 //      printf("begin SGP_scaled_energy\n");
00417 //      printf("n = %ld\n", *n);
00418 //      long ii;
00419 //      for( ii = 0 ; ii < *n ; ii++){
00420 //              printf("E_MeV_u[%ld]=%e\n", ii , E_MeV_u[ii]);
00421 //              printf("particle_no[%ld]=%ld\n", ii , particle_no[ii]);
00422 //      }
00423 
00424         // find look-up indices for A's for particle numbers in particle data
00425         long*   matches =       (long*)calloc(*n, sizeof(long));
00426         pmatchi(        particle_no,
00427                                 n,
00428                                 SGP_Particle_Data.particle_no,
00429                                 &SGP_Particle_Data.n,
00430                                 matches);
00431 
00432         // loop over n to find beta for all given particles and energies
00433         long    i;
00434         for(i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00435 
00436 //              printf("matches[0] = %d\n", matches[i]);
00437 
00438                 float   E_MeV           =       E_MeV_u[i] * SGP_Particle_Data.mass[matches[i]];
00439 
00440                 //printf("E_MeV = %d\n", E_MeV);
00441 
00442                 // Get rest energy
00443                 float   E0_MeV          =       (float)proton_mass_MeV_c2 * SGP_Particle_Data.mass[matches[i]];
00444 
00445                 //printf("E0_MeV = %d\n", E0_MeV);
00446 
00447                 // Return mass-scaled energy
00448                 scaled_energy[i]        =       E_MeV / E0_MeV * proton_mass_MeV_c2;
00449         }
00450 
00451         free(matches);
00452 
00453         //printf("end SGP_scaled_energy\n");
00454 
00455 }
00456 
00457 void SGP_max_E_transfer_MeV(    long*   n,
00458                                                                 float*  E_MeV_u,
00459                                                                 long*   particle_no,
00460                                                                 float*  max_E_transfer_MeV)
00461 {
00462         /* if E_MeV_u < 0:              use non-relativistic formula
00463          * if E_MeV_u > 0:              use relativistic formula
00464          */
00465         int*    relativistic            =       (int*)calloc(*n, sizeof(int));
00466         long    i;
00467         for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00468                 if(E_MeV_u[i] >= 0){
00469                         relativistic[i]                 = 1;
00470                 }else{
00471                         relativistic[i]                 = 0;
00472                         E_MeV_u[i]                              *= -1.0f;
00473                 }
00474         }
00475 
00476         // get relativistic speeds for all given particles and energies
00477         float*  beta    =       (float*)calloc(*n, sizeof(float));
00478         SGP_beta_from_particle_no(      n,
00479                                                                         E_MeV_u,
00480                                                                         particle_no,
00481                                                                         beta);
00482 
00483         for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00484                 if(relativistic[i] == 0){
00485                         max_E_transfer_MeV[i]   =       4.0f * electron_mass_MeV_c2 / proton_mass_MeV_c2* E_MeV_u[i];
00486                 }else{
00487                         max_E_transfer_MeV[i]   =       2.0f * electron_mass_MeV_c2 * beta[i] * beta[i] / (1.0f - beta[i] * beta[i]);
00488                 }
00489         }
00490 
00491         free(relativistic);
00492         free(beta);
00493 }

00497 void SGP_max_electron_range_mS( int*    n,
00498                                                                 float*  E_MeV_u,
00499                                                                 int*    particle_no,
00500                                                                 int*    material_no,
00501                                                                 int*   er_model,
00502                                                                 float*  max_electron_range_m)
00503 {
00504         long n_long = (long)(*n);
00505         long material_no_long = (long)(*material_no);
00506         long er_model_long = (long)(*er_model);
00507 
00508         long i;
00509         long * particle_no_long = (long*)calloc(*n,sizeof(long));
00510         for(i = 0 ; i < *n ; i++){
00511                 particle_no_long[i] = (long)particle_no[i];
00512 //              printf("output particle_no[%ld]=%ld\n", i , particle_no_long[i]);
00513         }
00514 
00515         SGP_max_electron_range_m( &n_long,
00516                                                                 E_MeV_u,
00517                                                                 particle_no_long,
00518                                                                 &material_no_long,
00519                                                                 &er_model_long,
00520                                                                 max_electron_range_m);
00521 
00522         free(particle_no_long);
00523 
00524 }
00525 
00526 #endif

00546 
00547 void SGP_max_electron_range_m(  long*   n,
00548                                                                 float*  E_MeV_u,
00549                                                                 long*   particle_no,
00550                                                                 long*   material_no,
00551                                                                 long*   er_model,
00552                                                                 float*  max_electron_range_m)
00553 {
00554 #ifdef _DEBUG
00555         indnt_init();
00556         indnt_inc();
00557         fprintf(debf,"%sbegin SGP_max_electron_range_m\n",isp);
00558         fprintf(debf,"%sn = %ld, material_no = %ld, er_model = %ld\n", isp, *n, *material_no, *er_model);
00559         long ii;
00560         for( ii = 0 ; ii < *n ; ii++){
00561                 fprintf(debf,"%sE_MeV_u[%ld]=%e\n", isp, ii , E_MeV_u[ii]);
00562                 fprintf(debf,"%sparticle_no[%ld]=%ld\n", isp, ii , particle_no[ii]);
00563         }
00564 #endif
00565 
00566         // Get density matching to material_name (only 1 name therefore n_mat = 1)
00567         //long  n_mat   = 1;
00568         //long  match;
00569         //pmatchi(      material_no,
00570         //                      &n_mat,
00571         //                      SGP_Material_Data.material_no,
00572         //                      &SGP_Material_Data.n,
00573         //                      &match);
00574 
00575         long*   matches =       (long*)calloc(*n, sizeof(long));
00576         float*  mass    =       (float*)calloc(*n, sizeof(float));
00577 
00578         pmatchi(        particle_no,
00579                                 n,
00580                                 SGP_Particle_Data.particle_no,
00581                                 &SGP_Particle_Data.n,
00582                                 matches);
00583 
00584         long    i;
00585         for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00586                 float tmpE      = E_MeV_u[i];
00587                 if (tmpE < 0) {tmpE *= -1.0f;}  // E can be set neg. if non-PSTAR are given --> use pos. value
00588 
00589                 mass[i] = SGP_Particle_Data.mass[matches[i]];
00590                 float E_div_E0 = E_MeV_u[i] / (mass[i]*proton_mass_MeV_c2);
00591                 float w_keV;
00592                 if( *er_model == ER_ButtsKatz ){
00593                         w_keV = 2 * electron_mass_MeV_c2 * ( E_div_E0*E_div_E0 + 2*E_div_E0) * 1e3;
00594                         max_electron_range_m[i] = 1e-5 * w_keV;
00595                 }
00596                 if( *er_model == ER_Waligorski ){
00597                         double alpha = 1.667;
00598                         w_keV = 2 * electron_mass_MeV_c2 * ( E_div_E0*E_div_E0 + 2*E_div_E0) * 1e3;
00599                         if( w_keV < 1. ) alpha = 1.079;
00600                         max_electron_range_m[i] =  6* 1e-6 * (float)pow( w_keV, alpha );
00601                 }
00602                 if( *er_model == ER_Geiss ){
00603                         max_electron_range_m[i] = 4e-5 * (float)pow(tmpE, 1.5);
00604                 }
00605                 if( *er_model == ER_Scholz ){
00606                         max_electron_range_m[i] = 5e-5 * (float)pow(tmpE, 1.7);
00607                 }
00608 
00609                 // Scale maximum el. range with material density relative to water (1/rho)
00610                 max_electron_range_m[i]         /= SGP_Material_Data.density_g_cm3[*material_no];
00611 
00612                 // covert cm to m
00613                 max_electron_range_m[i]         /= 1e2;  // cm to m
00614 
00615         }
00616 #ifdef _DEBUG
00617         for( ii = 0 ; ii < *n ; ii++){
00618                 fprintf(debf,"%srange[%ld]=%e\n", isp, ii , max_electron_range_m[ii]);
00619         }
00620         fprintf(debf,"%send SGP_max_electron_range_m\n",isp);
00621         indnt_dec();
00622 #endif
00623         free(matches);
00624         free(mass);
00625 
00626 
00627 }
00628 
00629 void SGP_Bohr_Energy_Straggling_g_cm2(  long*   n,
00630                                                                                 char**  material_name,
00631                                                                                 float*  dsE2dz)
00632 {
00633         // Get Bohr's energy spread (Wilson, 1947, Phys Rev 71, 385)
00634         long    i;
00635         for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00636                 float   electron_density_m3;
00637                 long    n_dummy = 1;
00638                 SGP_electron_density_m3(        &n_dummy,
00639                                                                         material_name[i],
00640                                                                         &electron_density_m3);
00641 
00642                 double  tmp                                     =       e_C * e_C * e_C * e_C * electron_density_m3;
00643                 tmp                                                     /=      4.0 * pi * e0_F_m * e0_F_m;
00644                 tmp                                                     /=      MeV_to_J * MeV_to_J * m_to_cm;
00645                 dsE2dz[i]                                       =       (float)tmp;
00646         }
00647 }
00648 
00649 void SGP_Z_from_particle_no(    long*   n,
00650                                                                 long*   particle_no,
00651                                                                 long*   Z)
00652 {
00653         // find look-up indices for A's for particle numbers in particle data
00654         long*   matches =       (long*)calloc(*n, sizeof(long));
00655 
00656         pmatchi(        particle_no,
00657                                 n,
00658                                 SGP_Particle_Data.particle_no,
00659                                 &SGP_Particle_Data.n,
00660                                 matches);
00661 
00662         // loop over n to find Z for all given particles and energies
00663         long    i;
00664         for(i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00665                 Z[i]    = SGP_Particle_Data.Z[matches[i]];}
00666 
00667         free(matches);
00668 }
